rules_text:
Spells you control and Phyrexian creatures you control deal damage to opponents in the form of poison counters. [i](A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)[/i]
Grand evolution 4–{U}{B}{R} [i]({U}{B}{R}: If this isn't a creature, it becomes a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature, then put four +1/+1 counters on it. Activate as a sorcery.)[/i]
